task.title: Add bundled dependency audit CI check

events.content: Added audit to package-validation.yml workflow: Added audit to package-validation.yml workflow

raw.question: Added audit to package-validation.yml workflow
raw.reasoning: Already runs on PRs to main, no need for a separate workflow

retrospective.summary: Added pre-merge CI check that audits bundled package dependencies. Hoisted 6 missing deps (zod, zod-to-json-schema, posthog-node, pg, smol-toml, @modelcontextprotocol/sdk) to root package.json.
